comment: Dr. McCoy is great! Very kind! Responds to emails fairly quickly and answers all questions! Gives great feedback! Only had to write 3 easy papers for the whole semester. Attendance was graded each week by just emailing him a question abt the assignment given. You need the textbook for the assignment given but can find it for free online. TAKE HIM!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Graded by few things

comment: This man won't shut up. He'll talk about bs for 30 min. Not an exaggeration. There's tons of one-page "papers" that you have to do that he doesn't take up. There's no helpful feedback on the papers you do turn in. The most interesting class was when we watched a video for the whole class. I'm an English major & still I didn't like him
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read
